title: Any word on if the ranked curfew in the early hours of the morning will be removed?
body: Server now has around 140-150k ranked players and just wondering if that is finally enough to remove the curfew that was introduced when there were only 40k ranked players.

replies.body:
http://oce.op.gg/statistics/tier/

139k Cumulatively, this does not include players who are still completing their promos.

OP.GG would probably be the source in that a bronze 2 that i know is.

>Ladder Rank 102,214 (76% of top) 

However that means we are looking at ~130k
Ranked was up at 5am today, instead of the usual 6am.
That's to do with Daylights savings effecting the time.
Yes but because he is obviously in WA/NT (whichever time zone he is describing), they fail to use DLS and thus the change he is describing is the change we had of DLSings finishing.

The problem is low server population.
If you want ranked turned on 100% of the time you'll need to get a larger regular population playing on OCE.
